full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BSTAN BSRUNG CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO GNOD SBYIN KshI TRA P'A LA 'KHOR DANG BCAS PA'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR BYED TSUL DGRA BGEGS 'JOMS PA'I GNAM LCAGS THOG MDA' ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES BSTAN BSRUNG GNOD SBYIN KshI TRA P'A LA'I SGO NAS BZLOG BSGYUR DGRA BGEGS THAL BAR RLOG PA'I GNAM THOG MDA' GNAD 'DUS 'BYOR LAS DAM NYAMS 'JOMS PA'I GNAM LCAGS THOG MDA' ZHES BRGYUD LHAN CIG BSRES CING GRUB CHEN BHEE RA WA BADZRA GYIS GSANG GTER SPAS RGYA: ZAB RGYA: AiTHI, ,)
